# Observability Endpoints

Audit logs, query history, and metastore summary.

## `GET /audit-logs`

Query audit logs

Retrieves paginated audit log entries, optionally filtered by principal, action, or status.

- Operation ID: `listAuditLogs`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | `string` | `false` | Filter by audit action type. |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `principal_name` | `string` | `false` | Filter by principal name. |
| `status` | `string` | `false` | Filter by status. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated audit log entries |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /catalogs/{catalogName}/metastore/summary`

Get metastore summary

Returns high-level information about the DuckLake metastore.

- Operation ID: `getMetastoreSummary`

### Path Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `catalogName` | `string` | `true` | Name of the catalog. |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Metastore summary |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `404` | The requested resource was not found. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |

## `GET /query-history`

List query execution history

Retrieves paginated query execution history, optionally filtered by principal, status, or time range.

- Operation ID: `listQueryHistory`

### Query Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `from` | `string` | `false` | Start of the time range filter (ISO 8601 datetime). |
| `max_results` | `integer` | `false` | Maximum number of results to return per page. |
| `page_token` | `string` | `false` | Opaque pagination token from a previous response. |
| `principal_name` | `string` | `false` | Filter by principal name. |
| `status` | `string` | `false` | Filter by status. |
| `to` | `string` | `false` | End of the time range filter (ISO 8601 datetime). |

### Responses

| Code | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `200` | Paginated query history |
| `400` | Invalid request parameters or malformed request body. |
| `401` | Authentication credentials are missing or invalid. |
| `403` | Insufficient privileges to perform this operation. |
| `429` | Rate limit exceeded. Retry after the indicated duration. |
| `500` | An unexpected internal server error occurred. |
